content: knitted top in drops cotton light piece is knitted with lace pattern cables v-neck and closure at the front pattern cluster-116 yarn group b **size** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops cotton light from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 250-250-300-300-350-400 g colour 02 white **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm **needles ** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 60 or 80 cm for stocking stitch and pattern drops circular needle size 3 mm length 60 or 80 cm for edges drops cable needle for cables drops mother-of-pearl **buttons** arched white no 521 4 pieces for all sizes
